text: Merton of the Movies is a 1922 novel by Harry Leon Wilson. Its adaptations include: * Merton of the Movies, a 1922 Broadway play by George S. Kaufman and Marc Connelly * Merton of the Movies (1924 film), a lost film * Make Me a Star (film), a 1932 film * Merton of the Movies (1947 film), starring Red Skelton ==See also== * Mary of the Movies, 1923 film using a similar plot * Polly of the Movies, 1927 film using a similar plot
title: Merton of the Movies
